name: PitchPerfect
0:
”Alexa, tell pitch perfect to give me a G”
”Alexa, tell pitch perfect to give me a A Flat”
”Alexa, tell pitch perfect to play an A Flat”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pitch perfect
des: If you need to just hear a note to help tune up your instrument or voice, Alexa can help. Just ask Alexa to open the "Pitch Perfect" skill and then say what note you would like to hear. For example, you could say 'Give me a G' or 'Play me an A Flat'
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
